title: Hour 3 - Scott Zolak and Tony Clark (07-02-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Scott Zolak and Tony Clark (07-02-20)
description:
Scott Zolak tells Dan that he is so excited to get Cam Newton. Scott says that he does not see Cam as the starting QB due to the timing that he got signed. Scott tells Dan that if Cam had of came in March; then starting could have been a possibility. Tony Clark tells Dan there are a lot of predictions, and a lot of open ended questions at this point, we'll have to see how things progress.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Scott Zolak tells Dan that he is so excited to get Cam Newton. Scott says that he does not see Cam as the starting QB due to the timing that he got signed. Scott tells Dan that if Cam had of came in March; then starting could have been a possibility. Tony Clark tells Dan there are a lot of predictions, and a lot of open ended questions at this point, we'll have to see how things progress.
